name: Senior Tech Recruiter
description:
In 2021 we plan to double R&D team to support international growth of Wheely. Our team is looking for a passionate Senior Technical Recruiter, who will develop, drive, and execute on the staffing strategies to hire best talent

This role is for someone who thrives in a face-paced, growth-focused environment. You will partner with hiring managers to understand hiring needs, craft interview processes and find/close high quality technical talent with little direction. You will have the freedom to experiment with new ideas and drive towards building diverse and passionate teams.

About Wheely

Wheely is a chauffeur-hailing app that is setting a new standard in urban transportation. It provides affluent consumers with a premium, comfortable, and consistent chauffeur-driven experience on demand.

Wheely is currently available in London, Moscow, St. Petersburg and recently launched in Paris. We have recently raised a $15 million Series B round to fund growth in top tier cities

Responsibilities

  • Own full recruitment process including interview, feedback and offer process for engineers (Golang, Ruby) and Analysts. Mostly they will be seniors;
  • Find, engage and activate passive candidates through the use of Boolean, LinkedIn and alternative search techniques;
  • Strategize different ways to build talent pipelines and execute on tactical research, referral generation, talent mapping, events and sourcing campaigns;
  • Collaborate with teams to deeply understand their hiring needs and proactively translate that into a positive candidate and interviewer experience;
  • Be a trusted partner to hiring managers. Coach and train them on interview and selling skills;
  • Participate in adaptation process of new starters;
  • Maintain data integrity and report recruiting metrics as needed;
  • Ensure that every candidate has a positive and engaging interview experience.

Requirements

  • 3-5 years of full-cycle recruiting experience, ideally both agency setting and in house in tech environment;
  • Experience working with engineering teams and hiring for technical roles;
  • Successful track record of attracting top senior engineering talent;
  • Experience independently partnering with leadership on hiring initiatives;
  • Passion and understanding of technology;
  • Excellent verbal and communication skills.

Benefits

Wheely expects the very best from its people, both on the road and at the office. In return, employees enjoy flexible working hours, stock options, and a range of exceptional perks and benefits.

  • First and foremost, we offer a competitive salary;
  • The Wheely culture is one of equity for all, which means that you will be more than just an employee. You will be a co-owner;
  • Monthly credit for journeys with Wheely;
  • Private health insurance (incl. dental and travel), life insurance;
  • Professional development;
  • Breakfast, fresh fruits and snacks available at the office;
  • Office is located in a beautiful mansion near Tsvetnoy Boulevard, although you may choose to work remotely from time to time.
